title: The Villainess Wants to Be Called Big Sister! - Novel Updates
author: 春乃春海
description:
After a freak accident, Grace, the daughter of a Count, realizes she carries memories of a previous life inside her. She realizes that she has been reincarnated into the world of an otome game but she can't quite believe it.

In the game, Grace's paternal half-sister Mira is the heroine, while Grace herself is the sadistic elder sister,the so-called Villainess who torments her younger sibling. However, with a newfound maturity from her past life memories, upon meeting her sister, her protective instinct as elder sister was awakened. Grace, who suddenly developed a major sister complex, was suddenly inspired by a new thought:

'Since Father is a scumbag, the one who protects my sister must be me!'

Just like in the game, the evil stepmother and target characters to woo such as the brother-in-law show up, creating challenges and opportunities!

To have her cute little sister call her 'Big Sister' with respect is Grace's deepest desire!!!>
